required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Fasting and Exercise-induced Changes in Human Skeletal Muscle
clinical_study.official_title: Impact of Exercise-induced Energetic Stress During an 8-hour Fast on Metabolic Regulation in Resting Human Skeletal Muscle

brief_summary.textblock: This study examines the impact of increasing energetic stress during an 8-hour fast on metabolic pathways in human skeletal muscle. Specifically, participants will undergo two 8-hour fasting sessions in a randomized crossover fashion, with the addition of low-intensity arm exercise in one of the sessions. Changes in metabolic pathways will be examined in resting (leg) muscle before, during, and after the fast.

primary_outcome.measure: Peroxisome proliferator activated receptor gamma co-activator 1-alpha (PGC-1α) messenger ribonucleic acid (mRNA) expression
primary_outcome.time_frame: 15 min before fast; after 4 and 8 hours of fasting
primary_outcome.description: PGC-1α gene expression (indirect indicator of PGC-1α activity)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 15 min before fast; after exercise; after 4 and 8 hours of fasting
secondary_outcome.description: Epinephrine and norepinephrine concentrations in plasma samples

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 15 min before fast; after 4 and 8 hours of fasting
secondary_outcome.description: Glucose and insulin concentrations in plasma samples

secondary_outcome.measure: total and phosphorylated AMP activated protein kinase (AMPK)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 15 min before fast; after 4 and 8 hours of fasting
secondary_outcome.description: active AMPK relative to total AMPK protein content

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 15 min before fast; after 4 and 8 hours of fasting
secondary_outcome.description: active SIRT-1 relative to total SIRT1 protein content

secondary_outcome.measure: total and phosphorylated mammalian target of rapamycin (mTOR)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 15 min before fast; after 4 and 8 hours of fasting
secondary_outcome.description: active mTOR relative to total mTOR protein content

secondary_outcome.measure: total and phosphorylated Akt/Protein Kinase B
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 15 min before fast; after 4 and 8 hours of fasting
secondary_outcome.description: active Akt relative to total Akt protein content

secondary_outcome.measure: total and phosphorylated acetyl coenzyme A carboxylase (ACC)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 15 min before fast; after 4 and 8 hours of fasting
secondary_outcome.description: active ACC relative to total ACC protein

secondary_outcome.measure: total and phosphorylated p38 mitogen activated protein kinase (MAPK)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 15 min before fast; after 4 and 8 hours of fasting
secondary_outcome.description: active p38 MAPK relative to total p38 MAPK protein

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 15 min before fast; after 4 and 8 hours of fasting
secondary_outcome.description: phosphorylated PKA substrates (indirect measure of PKA activity)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 15 min before fast; after 4 and 8 hours of fasting
secondary_outcome.description: p53 acetylation status (indirect measure of SIRT-1 deacetylase activity)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 15 min before fast; after 4 and 8 hours of fasting
secondary_outcome.description: gene expression of the deacetylase enzyme SIRT1

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 15 min before fast; after 4 and 8 hours of fasting
secondary_outcome.description: gene expression of the deacetylase enzyme SIRT3

secondary_outcome.measure: Pyruvate dehydrogenase kinase isoenzyme 4 (PDK4) mRNA expression
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 15 min before fast; after 4 and 8 hours of fasting
secondary_outcome.description: gene expression of the PGC-1α target PDK4

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 15 min before fast; after 4 and 8 hours of fasting
secondary_outcome.description: gene expression of the tumour suppressor protein p53

secondary_outcome.measure: Leucine rich pentatricopeptide repeat containing protein (LRP130) mRNA expression
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 15 min before fast; after 4 and 8 hours of fasting
secondary_outcome.description: gene expression of RNA-binding protein LRP130

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 15 min before fast; after 4 and 8 hours of fasting
secondary_outcome.description: gene expression of the acetyltransferase GCN5

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 15 min before fast; after 4 and 8 hours of fasting
secondary_outcome.description: Protein content of the transcriptional co-activator PGC-1α

secondary_outcome.measure: Cytochrome C oxidase subunit 4 (COX-IV) protein content
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 15 min before fast; after 4 and 8 hours of fasting
secondary_outcome.description: Protein content of the mitochondrial enzyme COX subunit 4

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 15 min before fast; after 4 and 8 hours of fasting
secondary_outcome.description: Muscle glycogen content

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 15 min before fast; after 4 and 8 hours of fasting
secondary_outcome.description: Muscle IMTG content

intervention.description: Participants will perform 2-hours of low-intensity arm exercise (8 x 15 min bouts of arm ergometer exercise separated by 10 min of rest) during an 8-hour fast.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- recreationally active (no more than 3 hours of weekly physical activity)
- not currently involved in a systematic training program
- body mass index < 30 kg/m2
Exclusion Criteria:
- presence of cardiometabolic disease
- taking regular oral medication
- current smoker

facility.name: School of Kinesiology and Health Studies
